mapper.sql: imageid, orgid, branchid, folderid, name, oname, uuid, width, height, filepath, filename, size, md5, status, objtype, objid, description, thumbnail, relatetype, relateid, relateurl, adflag, createtime, createstaffid
mapper.select: select imageid, orgid, branchid, folderid, name, oname, uuid, width, height, filepath, filename, size, md5, status, objtype, objid, description, thumbnail, relatetype, 0 as relateid, relateurl, adflag, createtime, createstaffid from image where imageid = #{imageid} and status != '9'

select
from image where status = 1 and uuid = #{uuid}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into image (orgid, branchid, folderid, name, oname, uuid, width, height, filepath, filename, size, md5, status, objtype, objid, description, thumbnail, relatetype, relateid, relateurl, adflag, createtime, createstaffid ) values (#{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{folderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{width,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{objtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{objid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relatetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{relateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relateurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update image
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchid = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
folderid = #{folderid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oname = #{oname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
width = #{width,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},
filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
